data.title: First visit
data.text: It's been here for years but for some reason I've never visited.  My husband and I went on a Friday evening for a late meal and drinks.  Multiple beer options and good drinks.  Casual friendly service.  Buns baked fresh daily from bakery across the street.  We will go again!

data.title: Burgers
data.text: Great food. Between dive bar and diner. Decent service great food every time. Daily drink specials and very affordable.

data.title: Nice Neighborhood Restaurant
data.text: Great place to relax and have lunch. Cheeseburger was great and cooked rare as I requested, fries fabulous, broasted chicken ,unbelievably crisp and moist. Beer on tap ,delicious.Service was very attentive and GOOD. Right across street from Beaverton Bakery ,where you could literally have dessert with generous free samples but I can never resist their cupcakes, to take home.

data.title: Great Burger, Fantastic Fries
data.text:
Went here for dinner with the neighbors.  It was one of the best burgers I've eaten at a restaurant.  The fries were perfect and didn't need ketchup - and I'm a ketchup fanatic when it comes to fries.

None of us were able to finish our fries or tater tots (which were also perfectly cooked.)

data.title: simply the best!
data.text: Terrific tequila sunrise, cold beer, tasty iced tea, OK potato salad, great fries. Honestly, one of the tastiest burgers I have had...fresh lettuce, mayo, tomato. Went directly across the street and bought some of their hamburger buns from BB. Plenty of parking, nice places to walk around and see on a nice Saturday afternoon. Probably should have given 5 stars.

data.title: Get the Heatwave burger and a Tricerahops!
data.text: Good selection of beer. Burgers are quite good!  Heatwave burger is very nice. If you like it hotter, go for the XXX habaneras sauce.

data.title: Best Burgers around
data.text: I am sure I reviewed Ringo's before, but I want to confirm that they still have the best burgers in the area.  You have to keep in mind that this really is a Tavern; hence the atmosphere is what it is - but it isn't stuffy, cramped, or stinking.  It is good food, nice staff, reasonable price, and a great place to hang out!

data.title: Get the Fried Chicken
data.text: They have broasted fried chicken -- basically pressure fried chicken! It come out crispy and juicy. It is worth the wait. When you first enter it, you may question your decision. Don't worry. We have always had great service and surprisingly good food. They also do locally sourced meat for burgers and such. The games will be on... or you can play pool in the back.
